statements: SELECT * FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours
SELECT tour_id, tour_date, guide_name FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours WHERE location = 'Mount Everest'
SELECT guide_name, location, current_participants FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours ORDER BY guide_name ASC
SELECT * FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours WHERE max_participants > 10
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_tours FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours GROUP BY location
SELECT * FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours WHERE location = 'Mount Everest'
SELECT tour_date, guide_name, location FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours WHERE max_participants > 5 ORDER BY tour_date DESC
SELECT guide_name, current_participants FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours WHERE tour_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tours, SUM(current_participants) AS total_participants FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours WHERE location LIKE '%Mount%'
SELECT MAX(max_participants) AS max_capacity, MIN(max_participants) AS min_capacity FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours WHERE guide_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM TourAvailability WHERE available_capacity > 0
SELECT tour_id, tour_date, tour_guide_id FROM TourAvailability
SELECT tour_id, tour_date, available_capacity FROM TourAvailability WHERE tour_guide_id = 1
SELECT * FROM TourSchedule WHERE start_time < '12:00:00'
SELECT schedule_id, end_time FROM TourSchedule WHERE tour_id = 2
SELECT * FROM TourAvailability WHERE available_capacity > 0 ORDER BY tour_date DESC
SELECT tour_id, tour_guide_id FROM TourAvailability WHERE tour_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT tour_id, start_time, end_time FROM TourSchedule WHERE start_time < '12:00:00' AND end_time > '14:00:00' ORDER BY start_time
SELECT tour_id, COUNT(*) AS num_tours FROM TourSchedule GROUP BY tour_id HAVING num_tours >= 3
SELECT MIN(available_capacity) AS min_capacity, MAX(available_capacity) AS max_capacity FROM TourAvailability
SELECT * FROM guided_tours;
SELECT tour_name, start_date, end_date FROM guided_tours;
SELECT tour_name, tour_description, tour_guide FROM guided_tours WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, booking_date, booking_status FROM tour_bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT tour_name, capacity, available_date FROM guided_tours INNER JOIN tour_availability ON guided_tours.tour_id = tour_availability.tour_id WHERE remaining_slots > 0;
SELECT * FROM guided_tours ORDER BY tour_name DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT tour_name, tour_guide FROM guided_tours WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT tour_id, tour_name, start_date, end_date FROM guided_tours WHERE tour_guide = 'John Doe';

SELECT tb.booking_id, tb.customer_name, gt.tour_name, ta.remaining_slots FROM tour_bookings tb JOIN guided_tours gt ON tb.tour_id = gt.tour_id JOIN tour_availability ta ON ta.tour_id = gt.tour_id WHERE tb.booking_status = 'Confirmed';

SELECT ta.tour_id, ta.capacity, COUNT(tb.booking_id) AS total_bookings FROM tour_availability ta LEFT JOIN tour_bookings tb ON ta.tour_id = tb.tour_id GROUP BY ta.tour_id HAVING total_bookings > 0 ORDER BY total_bookings DESC;
SELECT * FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours ORDER BY tour_id DESC;
SELECT tour_name, tour_location, tour_guide, tour_difficulty FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours WHERE tour_difficulty > 3;
SELECT tour_name, tour_capacity FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours WHERE tour_location = 'Mount Everest';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tours FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours;
SELECT tour_id, tour_name, tour_capacity FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours WHERE tour_capacity BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours WHERE tour_difficulty > 5;
SELECT tour_name, tour_location, tour_guide FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours WHERE tour_capacity >= 10 ORDER BY tour_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM tour_feedback GROUP BY tour_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 4;

SELECT tour_name, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours JOIN tour_participants ON guided_rock_climbing_tours.tour_id = tour_participants.participant_id GROUP BY tour_name;

SELECT tour_name, tour_date, available_slots FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours INNER JOIN available_tour_dates ON guided_rock_climbing_tours.tour_id = available_tour_dates.tour_id ORDER BY tour_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM tours;
SELECT tour_name, tour_location, tour_difficulty FROM tours ORDER BY tour_location DESC;
SELECT tour_name, tour_duration FROM tours WHERE tour_price < 100;
SELECT guide_name, guide_experience, guide_rating FROM guides WHERE guide_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY guide_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM tours WHERE tour_difficulty = 'Intermediate';
SELECT tour_name, tour_location, tour_duration FROM tours WHERE tour_duration >= '3 hours';
SELECT tour_name, tour_difficulty, tour_price FROM tours WHERE tour_price < 100.00;
SELECT guide_name, guide_experience, guide_rating FROM guides WHERE guide_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY guide_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_status = 'Confirmed' ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
